org.sat4j.pb.core

クラス PBSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.minisat.core.Solver<PBDataStructureFactory>
      • org.sat4j.pb.core.PBSolver
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.io.Serializable, ICDCL<PBDataStructureFactory>, Learner, IPBCDCLSolver<PBDataStructureFactory>, IPBSolver, IPBSolverService, IProblem, ISolver, ISolverService, RandomAccessModel, UnitPropagationListener
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    PBSolverCP, PBSolverResolution

    public abstract class PBSolver
extends Solver<PBDataStructureFactory>
implements IPBCDCLSolver<PBDataStructureFactory>, IPBSolverService
    関連項目:
    直列化された形式

    • メソッドの詳細

      • addPseudoBoolean

        public IConstr addPseudoBoolean(IVecInt literals,
                                IVec<java.math.BigInteger> coeffs,
                                boolean moreThan,
                                java.math.BigInteger degree)
                         throws ContradictionException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IPBSolver
        Create a Pseudo-Boolean constraint of the type "at least n or at most n of those literals must be satisfied"
        定義:
        addPseudoBoolean インタフェース内 IPBSolver
        パラメータ:
        literals - a set of literals. The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        coeffs - the coefficients of the literals. The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        moreThan - true if it is a constraint >= degree, false if it is a constraint <= degree
        degree - the degree of the cardinality constraint
        戻り値:
        a reference to the constraint added in the solver, to use in removeConstr().
        例外:
        ContradictionException - iff the vector of literals is empty or if the constraint is falsified after unit propagation
        関連項目:
        ISolver.removeConstr(IConstr)

      • setObjectiveFunction

        public void setObjectiveFunction(ObjectiveFunction obj)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IPBSolver
        Provide an objective function to the solver.
        定義:
        setObjectiveFunction インタフェース内 IPBSolver
        パラメータ:
        obj - the objective function

      • getObjectiveFunction

        public ObjectiveFunction getObjectiveFunction()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IPBSolver
        Retrieve the objective function from the solver.
        定義:
        getObjectiveFunction インタフェース内 IPBSolver
        定義:
        getObjectiveFunction インタフェース内 IPBSolverService
        戻り値:
        the objective function

      • addAtMost

        public IConstr addAtMost(IVecInt literals,
                         IVecInt coeffs,
                         int degree)
                  throws ContradictionException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IPBSolver
        Create a pseudo boolean constraint of the type "at most".
        定義:
        addAtMost インタフェース内 IPBSolver
        パラメータ:
        literals - a set of literals The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        coeffs - the coefficients of the literals. The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        degree - the degree of the pseudo-boolean constraint
        戻り値:
        a reference to the constraint added in the solver, to use in removeConstr().
        例外:
        ContradictionException - iff the constraint is found trivially unsat.
        関連項目:
        ISolver.removeConstr(IConstr)

      • addExactly

        public IConstr addExactly(IVecInt literals,
                          IVecInt coeffs,
                          int weight)
                   throws ContradictionException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IPBSolver
        Create a pseudo-boolean constraint of the type "subset sum".
        定義:
        addExactly インタフェース内 IPBSolver
        パラメータ:
        literals - a set of literals. The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        coeffs - the coefficients of the literals. The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        weight - the number of literals that must be satisfied
        戻り値:
        a reference to the constraint added to the solver. It might return an object representing a group of constraints.
        例外:
        ContradictionException - iff the constraint is trivially unsatisfiable.

      • addExactly

        public IConstr addExactly(IVecInt literals,
                          IVec<java.math.BigInteger> coeffs,
                          java.math.BigInteger weight)
                   throws ContradictionException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IPBSolver
        Create a pseudo-boolean constraint of the type "subset sum".
        定義:
        addExactly インタフェース内 IPBSolver
        パラメータ:

        coeffs - the coefficients of the literals. The vector can be reused since the solver is not supposed to keep a reference to that vector.
        weight - the number of literals that must be satisfied
        戻り値:
        a reference to the constraint added to the solver. It might return an object representing a group of constraints.
        例外:
        ContradictionException - iff the constraint is trivially unsatisfiable.

      • primeImplicant

        public int[] primeImplicant()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IProblem
        Provide a prime implicant, i.e. a set of literal that is sufficient to satisfy all constraints of the problem.
        定義:
        primeImplicant インタフェース内 IProblem
        オーバーライド:
        primeImplicant クラス内 Solver<PBDataStructureFactory>
        戻り値:
        a prime implicant of the formula as an array of literal, Dimacs format.
